## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Pipe Network at Position (-46.5, -122.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
- Pipes connecting various positions including (-46.5, -122.5), (-47.5, -122.5), (-46.5, -121.5), (-44.5, -120.5), (-45.5, -120.5), (-45.5, -121.5), (-42.5, -120.5), (-43.5, -120.5), (-42.5, -119.5), (-40.5, -118.5), (-41.5, -118.5), (-41.5, -119.5), (-40.5, -116.5), (-40.5, -117.5), (-42.5, -110.5), (-42.5, -111.5), (-40.5, -110.5), (-41.5, -110.5), (-38.5, -111.5), (-38.5, -110.5), (-39.5, -110.5), (-37.5, -111.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage at Position (-15.0, -76.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -76.0)
- Wooden Chest at Position (-15.5, -77.5)

### Copper Plate Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at Position (-19.0, -73.0)

### Iron Plate Furnace and Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at Position (6.0, -62.0)
- Inserter at Position (6.5, -60.5)
- Wooden Chest at Position (6.5, -59.5)

### Electricity Network
Consists of the following entities:
- Small Electric Poles connecting various positions including (6.5, -60.5), (5.5, -60.5), (7.5, -60.5), (5.5, -59.5), (7.5, -55.5), (6.5, -54.5), (7.5, -54.5), (2.5, 27.5), (5.5, 27.5), (2.5, 28.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Establishing Power Connections
- Ensure there are no placement blockages when connecting power poles. Verify that the path between poles is clear of any obstructions.

### Inserter Not Receiving Power
- Make sure that inserters are connected to a power source. Check the power network connections and ensure that the inserter is within the range of a powered electric pole.

### Asserting Power Status
- Verify that all entities requiring power are properly connected to the power network before asserting their power status. Check for any warnings or errors related to power connectivity.
